ca1a1af8-1d1b-4eef-892b-8d92b0a89d41.Text: For the next attack against a target affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and block will be reduced by −<u>(15 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} / 2) × stacks of exploit)</u>%. This attack will have +<u>(15 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} / 2) × stacks of exploit)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. It will also do +(100 + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception})% damage.

c9d22b73-9f30-40ec-8550-00bdbfa2f8c6.Text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Alpha Strike{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed)</u> (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

de578abd-c1e5-42da-b022-e431e335a598.Text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Alpha Strike{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

d9fe0ee9-f347-417a-9bdc-380fb74c9318.Text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +2 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.

a6b9621a-5d74-43d9-9b6e-5d3402b6550b.Text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(25 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.

3269e346-5c49-4e64-b9a9-7b6033a7d11a.Text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 7 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

651f40ee-ed3f-4d2a-9c5b-6442666e385b.Text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} targets one enemy within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. That target immediately gains +{uip|Exploits|502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}.
